summary: The module provides a comprehensive test suite for the apogee prediction component, exercising its initialization, start/stop lifecycle, queue timeout handling, convergence behavior, prediction loop timing, and verification of class slot usage. It also includes a lightweight threaded helper to run the predictor in a separate thread during tests.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and performance of the apogee prediction logic used in telemetry processing, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable operation in flight data analysis.
